One of my fondest memories of Barcelona!  By all means have breakfast at Pinotxo in the Boqueria!  Juanito's smile is contagious, and his food is superb.  All of the dishes, whether sweet pastries or savory egg and seafood dishes, are phenomenal.  The coffee drinks are all outstanding.  There is almost always a wait, and it is always worth it.  Go and enjoy!
